description: A child suffering or recovering from malaria needs plenty of liquids and food.
title: A child suffering or recovering from malaria needs plenty of liquids and food.
content:
A girl or boy suffering from malaria should be offered liquids and foods
frequently to help prevent dehydration and malnutrition.

Frequent breastfeeding prevents dehydration and helps the child fight
infections, including malaria. Children who are breastfeeding and suffering
from malaria should be breastfed as often as possible.

Frequent malarial infection can cause anaemia. A child who has had malaria
several times should be checked for anaemia.
